conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
workshop_paper contains tables such as submission.
Table submission has columns such as submission_id, scores, author, college.
conversations.query: Show the most common college of authors of submissions.
conversations.answer: select college from submission group by college order by count(*) desc limit 1;
